statements: SELECT * FROM raw_material_inventory;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM raw_material_inventory WHERE current_inventory > 50;
SELECT material_name, current_inventory FROM raw_material_inventory ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT * FROM raw_material_inventory WHERE reorder_point <= 10 ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM raw_material_inventory;
SELECT material_name, current_inventory FROM raw_material_inventory;
SELECT * FROM raw_material_inventory WHERE current_inventory < reorder_point;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM raw_material_inventory ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, current_inventory, reorder_point FROM raw_material_inventory WHERE current_inventory BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT material_name, CONCAT('Current Inventory: ', current_inventory) AS inventory_status FROM raw_material_inventory;
SELECT * FROM materials_inventory;
SELECT material_name, current_quantity, reorder_point FROM materials_inventory ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, current_quantity FROM materials_inventory WHERE current_quantity < reorder_point;
SELECT material_name, current_quantity, reorder_point FROM materials_inventory WHERE current_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM materials_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_quantity ASC;
SELECT material_name, current_quantity FROM materials_inventory
SELECT * FROM materials_orders WHERE order_quantity > 100
SELECT material_id, current_quantity FROM materials_inventory WHERE current_quantity < reorder_point
SELECT material_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM materials_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT material_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM materials_inventory JOIN materials_orders ON materials_inventory.material_id = materials_orders.material_id
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, current_inventory FROM materials WHERE current_inventory > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, quantity_shipped FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT material_name, current_inventory AS inventory_level FROM materials WHERE current_inventory < reorder_point;
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT material_name, current_inventory FROM materials WHERE current_inventory < reorder_point;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, shipment_date FROM materials JOIN shipments ON materials.material_id = shipments.material_id JOIN suppliers ON shipments.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity_shipped) AS total_shipped FROM materials JOIN shipments ON materials.material_id = shipments.material_id GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT id, material_name, quantity FROM materials ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE quantity < 100
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' AND email IS NOT NULL
SELECT material_name, quantity, reorder_point FROM materials WHERE quantity < reorder_point
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, shipments.quantity_shipped, shipments.shipment_date FROM suppliers JOIN shipments ON suppliers.id = shipments.supplier_id ORDER BY shipments.shipment_date DESC
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity_change) AS total_change FROM materials JOIN inventory_logs ON materials.id = inventory_logs.material_id GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_change > 0
SELECT * FROM raw_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity_on_hand FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_point;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity_on_hand, reorder_point FROM raw_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM raw_materials
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, quantity_shipped FROM shipments
SELECT material_name, quantity_on_hand, reorder_point FROM raw_materials
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers
